title: Lobster salad
text: A simple lobster salad with butter and just a hint of mayonnaise so that you can still taste the sweet lobster meat.

title: Chicken & orange salad
text: With juicy oranges and a yoghurt dressing, this chicken salad is a treat on any spring table.

title: Winter salad
text: This is a simple winter salad,  fresh and crisp.
